classSpec.desc: provides attributes identifying the source edition from which some encoded feature derives.

attDef.desc: supplies an arbitrary identifier for the source edition in which the associated feature (for example, a page, column, or line break) occurs at this point in the text.
attDef.valDesc: Any string of characters; usually a siglum conventionally used for the edition.

egXML.l:
Of Mans First Disobedience,
and
the Fruit

Of that Forbidden Tree, whose
mortal tast

Brought Death into the World,
and all
our woe,
